name: Retro Rescue
description:
You play as a pink whale, and you have to rescue your friend (a blue whale) by playing through three retro classics! With levels inspired by Breakout for the Atari 2600 and Nintendo's Game & Watch games Ball and Vermin, this is a must play for any retro gaming lovers.

Fun fact: You can play this game using a controller! Hook up a PlayStation 4 or Xbox One controller using a micro USB cable, and you can play the whole game with your own controller! Also, if you use a controller, you can input the most famous video game cheat code on the title screen and get a fun surprise!
